title: Direction of electric field from equipotentials

content.description: The diagram above shows equipotential lines produced by an unknown charge distribution. A, B, C, D, and E are points in the plane.
content.question: Which vector below best describes the direction of the electric field at point A?

choices.label: Choice A is an arrow pointing up and to the right.
Choice B is an arrow pointing down and to the left.
Choice C is an arrow pointing down and to the left.
Choice D is an arrow pointing up and to the left.
Non of the above; the field is zero.

content.answer: Choice A is an arrow pointing up and to the right.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
